# DIRTTIME

> Motorcycle and dirt bike maintenance tracking app for iOS

DIRTTIME is a free iOS application designed for motorcycle and dirt bike enthusiasts to track maintenance schedules, log riding hours and mileage, and receive service alerts.

## App Overview

- **Name:** DIRTTIME
- **Platform:** iOS (iPhone, iPad)
- **Price:** Free
- **Category:** Utilities / Automotive / Motorcycle

## Supported Brands

DIRTTIME works with all motorcycle and dirt bike brands including:

- **KTM** - SX, EXC, XC-W, Freeride series
- **Honda** - CRF, CRF-X, CRF-RX series
- **Yamaha** - YZ, YZ-F, YZ-FX, WR series
- **Husqvarna** - FC, FE, FX, TE, TX series
- **Kawasaki** - KX, KLX series
- **Suzuki** - RM-Z, DR-Z series
- **GasGas** - MC, EC, EX series
- **Beta** - RR, X-Trainer series
- **Sherco** - SE, SEF series
- **TM Racing** - MX, EN series

Also works with street motorcycles, adventure bikes, and ATVs/quads.

## Key Features

1. **Maintenance Tracking** - Log all maintenance activities including oil changes, filter replacements, chain adjustments, valve checks, and more
2. **Hour & Mileage Logging** - Track engine hours and distance for accurate service intervals
3. **Service Alerts** - Get notified when maintenance is due based on hours, mileage, or time
4. **Multiple Bikes** - Manage maintenance for multiple motorcycles in one app
5. **Maintenance History** - Complete history of all work performed on each bike
6. **Terrain Multipliers** - Adjust wear based on riding conditions (sand, mud, hard pack)
7. **iOS Widgets** - Quick view of maintenance status from home screen

## Use Cases

- **Motocross racers** tracking race bike maintenance
- **Enduro riders** monitoring service intervals
- **Trail riders** keeping bikes in top condition
- **Families** with multiple dirt bikes
- **Mechanics** managing customer bikes
- **Dealerships** tracking demo fleet maintenance

## Target Audience

- Dirt bike riders and racers
- Motorcycle enthusiasts
- Motocross (MX) and Supercross riders
- Enduro and cross-country racers
- Trail and recreational riders
- Off-road vehicle owners
- Two-stroke and four-stroke engine owners
